meanings.definition: A toxic herbicide used to control weeds.
meanings.sent1: The farmer sprayed paraquat on the field to kill the weeds.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to touch paraquat as it can be harmful.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit thought the paraquat was a tasty treat!
meanings.sent4: The paraquat worked like a powerful potion, wiping out the unwanted plants.
meanings.sent5: The paraquat's potency in eliminating weeds was truly impressive.

meanings.definition: To treat or spray with paraquat.
meanings.sent1: The gardener will paraquat the garden to get rid of the pesky weeds.
meanings.sent2: Remember to wear protective gear when you paraquat the crops.
meanings.sent3: The superhero paraquatted the evil plants with ease.
meanings.sent4: She paraquatted the field, turning it into a weed-free paradise.
meanings.sent5: Paraquatting the area ensured the plants would not grow back anytime soon.

meanings.definition: A chemical compound used in agriculture.
meanings.sent1: The scientists studied the effects of paraquat on crop growth.
meanings.sent2: Farmers rely on paraquat to protect their fields from unwanted plants.
meanings.sent3: The paraquat in the lab was kept under strict lock and key.
meanings.sent4: The fields flourished after the application of paraquat.
meanings.sent5: The distinct smell of paraquat filled the air during spraying.
